title: Revealed: Trump's 28-point plan to end Russia-Ukraine war
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's proposal to end Russia's war on Ukraine would require Ukraine to give up land and stay out of NATO.

title: White House defends Trump’s ‘piggy’ comment
shortDescription: The White House defended President Donald Trump as "frank and honest" after he called a reporter "piggy."

title: What's at stake in White House showdown between Trump and Mamdani?
shortDescription: The stakes couldn’t be higher for the Nov. 21 White House meeting between President Donald Trump and New York Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani.

title: Did Trump call a reporter 'piggy'? White House says he’s 'very frank'
shortDescription: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said President Donald Trump is "frank and honest" with reporters.

title: WH says Trump does not want to execute lawmakers
shortDescription: President Trump accused lawmakers of sedition, which he said is "punishable by death." But the White House said he does not want to execute lawmakers.

title: White House says Education Department not needed
shortDescription: Sec. Linda McMahon announced the Education Department had partnered with other government agencies to outsource many of its functions.

title: Judge halts Trump's National Guard deployment in DC
shortDescription: U.S. Judge Jia Cobb temporarily blocked Trump from deploying National Guard troops in Washington to enforce the law without approval from its mayor.

title: Trump watches? Vodka? Wrapping paper? You can buy these Trump-themed items
shortDescription: Donald Trump loves to put his name on stuff. If you're looking for a presidential-themed gift, you have Trump watches, Trump vodka and more.

title: Trump calls for six Democrats to be tried for 'seditious behavior'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump wrote that a group of Democratic lawmakers who urged servicemembers to refuse illegal orders should be 'put on trial.'

title: Feds: NJ GOP congressman's ex-staffer lied about being attacked
shortDescription: An ex-aide to Rep. Jeff Van Drew is accused of lying when she told police she was a victim of a politically motivated assault in a NJ nature preserve.

title: Zohran Mamdani to meet Trump in DC
shortDescription: President Donald Trump confirmed via Truth Social that he's meeting with NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani to discuss affordability and public safety.

title: Does 'protecting children' explain why MAGA rebuffed Trump on Epstein?
shortDescription: MAGA voters care passionately about protecting children from abuse. That might explain why Trump hasn't been able to stop the Epstein file release.
